items.sentence: I never for a moment imagined that you would show my letter to Tom.
Tom understands French fairly well, but he has trouble speaking it.
Tom should\'ve given Mary flowers or something on Valentine\'s Day.
Tom went out on a limb to help Mary and she didn\'t even thank him.
Tom wore a tie to work yesterday, but usually he doesn\'t wear one.
Tom\'s mother died just one week before Tom graduated from college.
Tom, I think we need to help Mary. It looks like she\'s in trouble.
What do you think is the best way to get to Tom\'s house from here?
Tom isn\'t the only one here who doesn\'t know how to speak French.
I\'ve been expecting something like this to happen for a long time.
